# problem1 
##  part1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

# create a dataframe
samp <- rnorm(8)
logical_greater_th_0 <- c(samp>0)
chara_vec <- c("a","b","c","d","e","f","g","h")
taste_vec <- factor(c("bad","bad","good","amazing","good","bad","good","amazing"),
                    c("bad","good","amazing"),
                    ordered =  TRUE)
data_f    <-  data.frame(samp,logical_greater_th_0,chara_vec,taste_vec)
```
